entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 119,599Chapters: 34/37Kudos: 39

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: Werewolf Ettiquette is a Pain in the Ass
entry.summary:
Author: thenerdyindividual

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,666Chapters: 10/11Kudos: 515

Summary: An unexpected visitor brings news that a rival Alpha is interested in taking over Beacon Hills. This means that Derek has to travel to Colorado to convince Werewolf Society to deny that petition. Packs with a mated alpha look stronger and more stable, so Derek needs a mate. Or more accurately, he needs someone to pretend to be his mate. Enter Stiles, who is somehow Derek's best option. Etiquette lessons bring them closer together than either of them expected, and the part of Derek that is more wolf than human is starting to take an interest.(Updates Wednesdays)

entry.summary:
Author: our_sin

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,090Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 60

Summary: "Derek groans as he wakes, eyes remaining closed and head still laying on the concrete. He wasn’t even aware he could hurt like this, he remembers what it was like to have wolfsbane in his system, even electricity slowing him and his healing down. entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 91,189Chapters: 19/36Kudos: 427

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't. He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating. No. No, Stiles definitely doesn't think about his best friend's older brother like that. What happens when the opportunity to confront his totally-not-a-crush appears: the Beacon Hills high school's Valentine's Day fundraiser? entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,085Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 78

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.
